name: Metroid: Spooky Mission
summary: Imago is at it again! It now threatens the very existence of Halloween! Getting to Imago is no simple task! It has infiltrated a massive space pumpkin and sealed off all entrances. Legend says that every Halloween three Holy beings appear in the physical realm… perhaps with these spooks, as people call them, Samus can gain access to the pumpkin and save Halloween!
